help.comment: Collects Test::Unit::Failure and Test::Unit::Error so that they can be displayed to the user. To this end, observers can be added to it, allowing the dynamic updating of, say, a UI.

methods.method: Returns the number of errors this TestResult has recorded.
Returns the number of failures this TestResult has recorded.
Returns whether or not this TestResult represents successful completion.
Returns a string contain the recorded runs, assertions, failures and errors in this TestResult.
